name: (Tim)Kai-Yuan Xu
body:
![Xu Kaiyuan](https://d17oy1vhnax1f7.cloudfront.net/items/1x392T0z290B3B0v1h1F/xky.jpg?v=604455d4)
### (Tim)Kai-Yuan Xu[[CV](https://cl.ly/3G3536252d2W)]
* Add.: Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China
* Tel.: +86-10-62792491
* Email: xky16@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn

### Adviser
* (Samuel) Qing-Shan Jia [Homepage](http://cfins.au.tsinghua.edu.cn/personalhg/jiaqingshan/HomgPage_QSJ_EN.htm)

### Education
* 2016 B.S. in Automation Engineering Tsinghua University, Beijing, China

### Research Interest
* Develop optimization-based control theory and methodology for large-scale complex systems through data-driven, statistical, and computational analysis with applications to energy systems, manufacturing systems, building systems, evacuation guidance systems, robotic systems, biological systems, cyber physical systems, and Internet of Things.

### Project Experience
* Closed-loop Control for Passive Dynamic Walking Based on Neural Network, Graduate Design, Jan.2016-July.2016
* Auto-balancing Bicycle, Developer, Sept.2014-Augest.2015
* Soccer Robot Based on ROS for RoboCup2015, Team Leader, Sept.2014-July.2015
* Two-Wheel Self-Balanced Vehicle Based on Myrio, Team Leader, Nov.2014-Jan.2015
* Cross-platform P2P Instant Messenger, Lead Developer, Dec.2014
* Autonomous Soccer Robot Control System Based on ROS, Lead Developer, Sept.2013-July.2014

### Intern Experience
* System Group, MSRA, Aug.2015-Oct.2015

### Awards
* NI Engineering Impact Award, Team member, 2016
* Grand Prize in Virtual Instrument Contest 2016, Team member, 2016
* 3rd Place in RoboCup2014 Soccer Robot Humanoid league AdultSize Competition, Team member, 2014
* 3rd Place in RoboCup2014 Soccer Robot Humanoid league AdultSize Technical Challenge, Team member, 2014
